amendatorysection.catchline: Retirement system; administration; Public Employees Retirement Board; duties; rules and regulations.
amendatorysection.para: The general administration of the Nebraska State Patrol Retirement System, except the investment of funds, is hereby vested in the board. The board shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations as may be necessary to carry out the Nebraska State Patrol Retirement Act. The board shall employ a director and such assistants and employees as may be necessary to efficiently discharge the duties imposed by the act.
